Invocation Name: smart remote
des:
This skill allows to control your home cinema and the same-named Android app. You need no additional hardware, just an Amazon Echo and your phone, and your TV will obey each word you say.

How does it work?

First of all you need the same named app Smart TV Remote on your compatible Android phone.
Install and setup this app in order to control your TV. You can find more information in the app description if your phone/TV is compatible and how to do that.

After that you need just to connect both, Amazon Echo and the app. Therefore you have to do:

1. Go to the app settings in Amazon Echo and click on register
2. Use the created code to connect the app with Amazon Echo by saying: "Alexa, tell Smart Remote to register my phone with code XXXX"
3. That's all, now Alexa controls your app and you can control your TV by voice.

You can disable the skill control feature without removing the connection between App and Amazon Echo.

You can find the Smart TV Remote app here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.adi.remote.phone
